message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. I've set the price at $1,350,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the significant benefits it will bring to your business.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I see the value in the product, but I'm working with a tighter budget. Could we meet somewhere around $1,100,000?

Bob, I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. While I'm aiming for a higher price point, I'm willing to come down to $1,275,000. This feels like a fair compromise that reflects the value it brings.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  To be totally transparent, my budget caps out at $1,150,000. If you're able to meet that, I'm ready to close the deal today.
